courses.title: Using Web Console to Manage Updates
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to apply system updates to Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems

courses.title: Creating images with the container tools
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to build containers from scratch or base images.

courses.title: Deploying Containers with Container Tools
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to deploy an existing container image using the utilities included in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Container Tools.

courses.title: Managing Software in an Application Stream
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to choose which version of a software package is enabled on a system from an application stream

courses.title: Using Image Builder
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to create customized RHEL OS images using Image Builder

courses.title: Configuring Red Hat Enterprise Linux System-Wide Crypto Policy
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to check, look through, and modify crypto policies.

courses.title: Using Red Hat Insights [Workshop Only]
courses.description: Goal: After completing this scenario, users will be able to register Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems with Red Hat Insights as well as use cloud.redhat.com to apply Insights.
